text: @AOC So what you're saying, with a straight face, is that covid-19 is literally picking & choosing black & brown people because it's profiling? Or is it bc it's a racist virus? Maybe the Chinese gave it a mind and sent it to take out non-whites? Step-down oxygen thief. #ChineseVirus19
